TopicTitle: What KSP has taught me to be annoyed at

Articles.Content:
ksp isn't an EA game.

I could have sworn it was an Early Access game.

The way JJ Abrams knew nothing whatsoever about Khan's lore seemingly didnt even watch the Wrath of Khan to know about Botney Bay.

No wait...how the enterprise went from high earth orbit to directly down.
